name: DANCERS OF WAR: A 3rd person action video game for PC!
blurb: A Musical Beat 'Em Up from the creator of JOHNNY BRAVO, the founder of DM, Yaz & ERASURE, plus AAA game veterans.

rewards.reward:
"I want to be supportive, but either A.) I'm saving up for Comic-Con and E3.  B.) I don't play video games. C.) None of your tiers include Zumba classes."
===========================
"Thank you and welcome to our Kickstarter family!  We appreciate you even taking the time to read this!"
===========================
REWARD:  Not only do you get our eternal gratitude, but your hard-earned money will go towards helping us get closer to making DANCERS OF WAR a reality!  You'll receive a hi-rez digital download DANCERS OF WAR DESKTOP IMAGE PAINTED BY VAN PARTIBLE and receive exclusive backer updates throughout the campaign and production!

REVISED EARLY BACKER REWARD!!! DATE FIX ON TYPO!!! A special price for all you early supporters! But only for one week ending on Monday, April 7th, 11:59:59 PM PST. =========================== "Don't you just love being an early adapter?" =========================== REWARD: Previous incentive + you'll receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF DANCERS OF WAR for your PC along with a digital manual. Plus, you'll be listed in the "Backers" section in the game credits and on the official website.

EARLY BACKER REWARD!  A special price for all you early supporters!  But only for one week ending on Monday, March 24th, 11:59:59 PM PST. =========================== "Don't you just love being an early adapter?"        =========================== REWARD: Previous incentive + you'll receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF DANCERS OF WAR for your PC along with a digital manual. Plus, you'll be listed in the "Backers" section in the game credits and on the official website.

"Which pledge tier is the one where I get the game when it comes out?"  
===========================
"You're looking at it."
===========================
REWARD: Previous incentive + you'll receive a DIGITAL DOWNLOAD OF DANCERS OF WAR for your PC along with a digital manual. Plus, you'll be listed in the "Backers" section in the game credits and on the official website.

REVISED EARLY BACKER REWARD!!! DATE FIX ON TYPO!!!  A special price for all you early supporters! But only for one week ending on Monday, April 7th, 11:59:59 PM PST. =========================== "With the $5 I just saved, I can go buy that venti carmel frappucino I've been jonesing for! Thanks Kickstarter!" ========================== REWARD: Previous incentives + an exclusive DIGITAL EP OF THE MUSIC FROM DANCERS OF WAR by VINCE CLARKE !

EARLY BACKER REWARD! A special price for all you early supporters!  But only for one week ending on Monday, March 24th, 11:59:59 PM PST. =========================== \r\n"With the $5 I just saved, I can go buy that venti carmel frappucino I've been jonesing for!  Thanks Kickstarter!" ========================== REWARD: Previous incentives + an exclusive DIGITAL EP OF THE MUSIC FROM DANCERS OF WAR by VINCE CLARKE !

"The game is cool and all, but I really want a copy of Vince's original score so I can dance to the music with my friends in the parking lot of Target."
=========================== 
"Well, if that's you, then this is the tier where you get to turn it up to 11!"
=========================== 
REWARD: Previous incentives + an exclusive DIGITAL EP OF THE MUSIC FROM DANCERS OF WAR by VINCE CLARKE !

"I want the game, but I also want a copy of the cool artwork."
===========================
"I am so there with you on that one."
===========================
REWARD: Previous incentives + a digital download of THE ART OF DANCERS OF WAR, chock full of photos and artwork from the making of the game.

"I would love a physical boxed copy that I can put next to my bronzed ballet shoes autographed by Mikhail Baryshnikov."
===========================
"And I want one to put one next to my Pepsi poster from the Jacksons Victory Tour!"
===========================
REWARD: Previous incentives + exclusive DANCERS OF WAR SPECIAL BOXED EDITION containing the game for your PC.  Your name will be featured in the "Awesome Box Backers" section of the credits.

"Do you have any incentives that are kinda kooky, yet apropos to Dancers Of War?" ===========================\r\n "I like the way you used 'kooky' and 'apropos' together in a sentence.  And yes, we do!" ===========================  REWARD: Every single previous incentive + a pair of 80's sweatbands branded with the "Dancers Of War" logo!  You know you're gonna want to show them off at your next hot yoga class.

"What about T-Shirts?"
===========================
"Seriously.  I was thinking the exact same thing."
===========================
REWARD: Previous incentives + exclusive DANCERS OF WAR KICKSTARTER T-SHIRT!

"Is there any way you could put my name in the game?  Like, I would play the game, and then pass some thing, and my name would be there, and I could dance in front of it?"
=========================== 
"That's a pretty elaborate scenario.  Elaborate and awesome!"
=========================== 
REWARD: All previous incentives from the $199 category and under + We will place your name somewhere in a level.  Maybe it's spray painted on a wall.  Maybe it's in neon lights on a sign.  Maybe it's in a bathroom stall.  Our only limit is our imagination.

"I LOVE Jennifer Hale!  Is she helping out with any incentives?"
=========================== 
"Glad you asked.  And the answer is a humbling, yes."
=========================== 
REWARD: Every single previous incentive + VOICE GREETING from JENNIFER HALE!! Fifteen seconds of Jennifer Hale saying whatever you want (within good taste) in whatever voice you want (she does a lot of them)!  We'll send you the MP3 file so you can use it as your outgoing voicemail, to wish someone a happy birthday, or to use as your ringtone!  The possibilities are endless (but the amount of people she'll do this for is limited)!

"I LOVE JOHNNY BRAVO!  Not enough to marry him, but is there any way I can get Van to draw me a picture?" ===========================  "Ab-so-smurfly!"\r\n===========================\r\nREWARD: All previous incentives from the $199 category and under + Van will create a PERSONALIZED PEN AND INK DRAWING OF JOHNNY BRAVO or SGT. JACK DANCER on a fancy 8 1/2 X 11" white piece  of Strathmore pen and ink paper.

"Is Vince going to be out promoting the next Erasure album?  And if so, when?  And do you have a tier where you can get a pair of concert tickets for backing this project?"
===========================
"I'm guessing that you love Erasure.  And if my guess is correct, then you may want to hurry up and click the fund button!"  
===========================
REWARD: All previous incentives from the $199 category and under + 2 tickets to see Erasure in concert this fall.  The tour dates are still yet to be announced, but if you live by a major city, chances are, they're going to be there.  Travel and lodging not provided.  While the concert tour is in the fall of 2014, all incentives will be shipped when the game is finished in 2015.

"I LOVE Vince!  I would love to get a selfie with him to post on my Facebook page."
=========================== 
"What if we did one better and got you guys together so you could talk about music!  Or cooking.  Or whatever you wanted, because this reward is all about hanging out with Vince Clarke!" 
=========================== 
REWARD: All previous incentives from the $199 category and under + A meet-and-greet with Vince Clarke + 2 tickets to see Erasure in concert this fall!  The tour dates are still yet to be announced, but if you live by a major city, chances are, Erasure's going to be there. Travel and lodging not provided.  While the concert tour is in the fall of 2014, all incentives will be shipped when the game is finished in 2015.

"I want to be a part of the game.  I mean REALLY part of the game."
=========================== 
"You sound like you want a reward tier that makes you all virtual and stuff.  That sounds cool."
======================== 
REWARD: All previous incentives from the $199 category and under + You come down to the studio and make up a dance move.  We name the dance move after you and we stick your face in the game!  (Travel and lodging not included.)
